Summary: An application that uses Mac OS's tools and Cocoa AP Is to read .NIB bundles and output skeleton code (for C#, Visual Basic .NET and Boo).

Author: mailto:l0ne@email.it

Incidentally, Nib Wrap is an example of a GUI application written completely in C# and Cocoa#.

The .app bundle and console .exe are available at http://traxnet.asidesoft.com/files/NibWrap.zip [41KB Source Code]
. (Please note that this is a work in progress and most of the code is underdocumented and poorly written.)
